name: Ludum Postal
description:
This is a submission for Ludum Dare 48

Theme: Deeper and Deeper

Ludum Postal

Here at Ludum Postal we care about our employees. 

That's why we offer 24/7 positions in our luxurious warehouses.

Work around the clock to satisfy our customers and fill our pockets.

Because Ludum Postal means Family and what wouldn't you do for Family?

Gameplay
  • Play as the person in charge of a warehouse facility. 
  • Identify products labeled by color.
  • Deliver the correct product to customers in time.
  • Fill the shelves to complete your shift.
Controls
  • WASD for movement
  • Left Mouse Button to interact
  • Mouse wheel to zoom while holding an item
